snippet: The drug, Entresto, could eventually achieve more than $5 billion in annual sales, said Novartis, which developed it.
abstract: Food and Drug Admin approves Novartis's new heart failure drug Entresto, which has proved to cut deaths and hospitalization from condition by 20 percent.
lead_paragraph: The drug, Entresto, could eventually achieve more than $5 billion in annual sales, said Novartis, which developed it.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Heart Drug Entresto Said to Cut Death Risk by 20%
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Drug Said to Cut Death Risk in Heart Patients by 20 Percent
